description.p: A black dress with white trim, ending right above the knees. A ruffled white half-apron hangs in front. White ruffled headpiece, stockings, and black high heels. Many nobles have their female servants wearing these uniforms, traditionally from the high dukes of the Ayari Plains.

A typical suit consisting of a waistcoat, grey or grey striped trousers, a white dress shirt, and a black or grey tie. Many nobles have their male servants wearing these uniforms, traditionally from the high dukes of the Ayari Plains.

A combination of a high-leg type Leotard-like costume without shoulder straps, a hair band imitating Rabbit's ears, a cufflink, a collar type choker, and a bow tie. Sme enterainers would wear these outfits to appeal to male-majority crowds, both publicly and privately.
